entry.title: The Kissinger Death Tontine
entry.content:
Post 189787 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Hey, um, we all hate war criminals but maybe "Let's gleefully talk about murdering one and/or pissing on his grave" is a sort of thin post and maybe not right for MeFi. Want to make a MeFi post abotu Kissinger and include this link? Go right ahead. -- jessamyn
